## Properties

| Property             | Attribute  | Description                                | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |

| `selected`           | `selected` | If the option is selected or not *         | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`    | Value bubbled up to the select component * | `string`  | `undefined` |
